评论详情: Daughter wore for a school dance. Looked great on her, it just wrinkles easily.
Beautiful well fitting dress!

Purchased for a fall wedding. It feels so nice! The size was perfect. The color was gorgeous. So many compliments! The quality is really nice. It is so fun to dance in and the material is comfortable, soft and not itchy. I might buy it in all of the colors! Great value for my money! Highly recommend if you need a versatile dress for a wedding during any season!

Love love love the color! There is a slip like skirt underneath so no worries about see through. The dress itself is stretchy but the halter neck is very tight and it is very tight in the bust area. The rest of it fit perfectly and it held up very well for a wedding I attended. I can definitely see me wearing it again if I add some additional fabric around the neck piece so I don’t feel like I’m choking.
I bought it for a wedding but didn’t end up wearing it.. it looked too big and bulky. But it’s cute… maybe if I had gotten a smaller size

评论概述: No for big chested woman or wide backs
评论详情: Beautiful dress no stretch and very tight in the chest area it was literally squishing my girls with nothing on them I tried putting cakes on to cover and they did not fit in so you can imagine how tight the chest area is
I received lots of compliments wearing this dress for my 45th anniversary cruise.

评论概述: Don’t go by the size chart
评论详情: I followed the size chart from the vendor and ordered the size they recommended. (XXL)The dress was really big on me on the top. Returned it and ordered the regular size that I usually get when i shop normally.(L) The dress fit perfectly once I received the correct size. The color of the dress is exactly as the one in the picture, the fabric is really nice. I’m 5’1 and the dress was the perfect length for me as a long dress. It was just what I was looking for.
See picture! Actually very pretty and comfortable!
Well made and very flowy
Definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a wedding outfit!
As a petite, plus sized female I was worried about finding an outfit that was formal enough but still comfortable. This dress was exactly that! 10/10 recommend!
Excellent in quality, price and is beautiful!
I love the dress! I did receive a stained dress but the vender is already working with me to replace the stained dress. Super easy
Loved this dress but it was a two person job to get out of
El vestido está precioso, lo usé para una boda y fue realmente perfecto. Lástima que la segunda lavada ya le están saliendo bolitas a la tela.

评论概述: I like it, but the fabric gets wrinkle easily.
评论详情: I love the style.
Great dress..fit well and material was nice!  Would definitely buy again
Great fit, great style, a little steaming and it was a wonderful dress to wear to dinner!
Super flattering and love the style!
I love love love this dress! Couldn't be happier! As a mom struggling to lose the baby weight, I was nervous about attending a wedding due to what to wear. This was so flattering!
It’s actually a v neck and not like the picture looks like. The cut of the dress is actually in the middle of the left, not on the side like in the picture. Very disappointed.
Looked frumpy in it. I think though if i sized down it would still be like that. Just a lot of flowy material but not flattering on me. Returned. In between sizes per measurement so i sized up to L

I loved the color and the quality of this dress. It’s a great value find, and is worth buying in at least two colors. It’s lightweight but heavy enough to wear in the early fall because it has a liner. It’s not stretchy but true to size. I’m wearing an xl.

评论概述: My favorite purchase in a long time
评论详情: Bought this dress to wear at a friends wedding that I was photographing. It fit perfect, is lined and stayed where it needed to while I was running around. I hope I have a chance to wear it again.

Beautiful material gorgeous green color halter top and waist line is very flattering calf length very happy with it. I added with a beige shawl and tan shoes. Green topaz jewelry wanted to dress it down a little bit but can be dressed up fancy . I did send it to the dry cleaners to have it pressed because it did arrive wrinkly.
Can wear for many occasions ! Even for a Black Bridal Dress code requested from Bride. I guess thats thing now. Strange.
It just didn't hang correctly.  Fabric was great!

评论概述: Runs large, nice material and color, comfortable
评论详情: Nice material and very comfortable, beautiful color, very flowy. Possibly an XS would have worked much better if they had that size, but the Small fits closer to a size 6. Unfortately the cut runs large and so it won't work for thinner petite women who have smaller chests. The neck part is very loose and the top feels like I'm wearing a sack. So not super flattering for me. The waist is stretchable so if you need some room this definitely has it, but unfortunately no amount of tightening with the belt helps as it starts looking bunched up.  Not sure if I will return since I do like how it could look once adjusted. I may have to do a bit of alterations to get it to fit properly. Also the torso runs long as well, so for shorter petite women this may not work for you.

I have a large chest(32I) and the dress fit amazing with a little raise up, but still sit at my waistline. Also wore this on a 113°F day....I was sweating non stop... literally sticky all over but absolutely nothing showed up the dressed and nobody was able to tell I was even sweaty. This dress was amazing for a very extremely hot day and whenever the breeze came by it was very breathable fabric
Cute dress and very comfortable

评论概述: Cute Wedding Guest or Date Night Dress
评论详情: XL corresponds to US14-16 size, and is really complimentary to curvy shapes (40D cup size, thicc thighs, etc). I wore this to a wedding and then later for a date night. With a quick steam, it does not disappoint.

I am 5'2 and 110 pounds and I bought the small. It went to my ankles. I had an evening wedding and have worn the same dress to weddings for the past 12 years, so I decided to treat myself. The dress is very flowy and comfortable. I got many compliments on it. I had originally ordered the orange. I loved that one too, but the mother of the groom said it might be a bit too bright for a formal evening wedding. LOL. It wrinkles easily but I just threw it in the dryer on dewrinkle and it was fine. I also spilled a plate of chocolate desserts on my dress at the end of the night. I threw the dress in the wash two days later (we were traveling) and it cleaned up nicely. I don't pretend to be a pretty woman but I felt very beautiful in my dress and danced the night away.
The material and fit of this dress was off for me. Sent it back.

评论用户: Perfect for what I need it for
评论详情: Perfect for the occasion I need it for
Fits perfectly
I ordered in green and it is beautiful.  I bought it to wear to a wedding.  I ordered two sizes because I wasn’t sure.  I typically wear a medium and the medium fit perfect.  The style is adorable.
I got so many compliments on this dress. It fit perfect and was very flattering.

评论概述: Not a good cut for me
评论详情: The neck made me feel like I was choking, everything else fit but the neck of the dress.

Nice quality compared to other dresses I ordered. It’s very flatter on and true to size. I have a large bust and it’s a tiny bit tight up top but still fits well! Excited to wear this to a Labor Day weekend wedding.
Can't  wait to wear it!! I sized up so that it would be billowy, I'll do some minor alterations under the arms so it won't gag. Nice, flowy & comfortable  lined too  .
Free show with this one. You definitely need to wear a slip or something underneath. This dress is very see through.
It was well sewn and very nice fabric. I got lots of compliments on it when I wore it to dinner. The fact that is lined is a bonus!
Odd fitting shape.  Returned.

评论概述: Not dissappointing as far as fabric and color.
评论详情: It was too big for me and not the right style for my frame.

The fit was perfect and flowy. I got a lot of compliments on the dress. It made me feel beautiful and confident. Wore to my brothers wedding, which was outside. The fabric was cool, light weight, and comfortable in the heat.  It was true to size too. I would recommend this dress.

I got the medium-sized red one. It is pretty well made, and has a lining. The top is a little large on me, but wearable, and I think I can take it in a bit. The one thing I don't like is how the ruffles are serged along the edges, it makes it look a bit costume-y.

This dress makes me wish it came in an XS. For reference, I am 5'5", 123 pounds and usually wear a size 4. The size small has too much fabric on the sides and bunches up above and below the waist. It reminds me of in "The Little Mermaid", when they try to make Ariel a dress out of a piece of sail fabric and some rope. The slit gets completely lost in all the fabric, and it hits too far over to the side. The waist also sits weird. It is too high to be a natural waistline, but too low to be a princess. The Peacock color is lovely, and the dress is nicely lined - just wasn't a great fit for me.
Exceeded my expectations but too big so I have to return it but it’s gorgeous Amazing quality but for a tall women. I’m only 5’3”

评论概述: Pretty but not very flattering on me
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress but it's just not flattering on my body type. It is pretty and looks like good quality but it doesn't nothing for my curves and makes my body look like a rectangle. Even pulling the waist in doesnt work. Maybe for a smaller body type it would look better.

评论概述: Nice quality, true to size. Not true color
评论详情: It's nicely made and material is great. I love it. But the nice deep red in the picture  is not what you get. It's Def more Rose Red. You know red with pink undertone. I needed deep red exactly like the Pic. So I took a star off for that. But I love it so much I'm keeping it to wear some where else. And thunk I'll order another color too. I'll post Pic after I wear it for in laws renewal ceremony.

This dress is very well made and lined. I ironed it thoroughly before packing it and taking it across the country to a wedding. It only needed a light touch up in the hotel room. I would definitely recommend it!  Nice fabric, pretty teal color and the ruffles are very flattering. I'm almost 5'11" and the length was fine for me.
I am 5'4, and this was a lot of fabric.  Felt heavy and bulky. I returned. The color was pretty. I have a shorter torso, and this dress wasn't working for that either.
Size is accurate and well made

I am really shocked at how much I liked this dress. I got it in lavender in the 2xl size. I thought not having the ruffles on the back looked totally fine, and I received many compliments on my dress. I wore it to an upscale wedding with wedges and nice earrings. Did not feel casual at all.  I will say that the dress is very wrinkly coming out of the bag. However, the wrinkles ironed out very easily.

Loved the dress and it was a flattering, true to size fit. It has to be steamed instead of ironed and it took forever with the layers of fabric. That said, a higher quality dress than I was expected for the price of the garment.
Wore for my daughter's wedding.  Compliments all day.

I'm satisfied with the "feel" of this dress, delighted by the color and fit, but dismayed by the design.  I cannot decide whether to keep or return it.  It's so pretty from the front, but the lovely skirt ruffles end at the side seams- It looks great from the front, very different from the back and from the side... uh... one can see the "facade" discrepancy.  I think I either have to order a second one to get ruffles for the back, or I'll have to return this one.
I bought this dress for my daughter's graduation and got so many compliments.  It fit great even having a larger chest which is hard to find.
The dress came very wrinkled and I had to steam it. I'm 5'4 and 117 pounds and the dress fit me perfectly. It was a beautiful dress that I wore for a wedding.

Love the style, material, fit & flow of this dress..altho it's real long on me (I'm 5'2") will wear my gold platform shoes to keep it off the floor. Will be taking in on my trip to attend a Wedding & possibly on my Cruise as well..We'll done Grace Karin
Quality is low, but what did I expect for such a cheap price.
Comfortable to wear. Nice fit and fabric. True to size and color.
The color is beautiful (blue) just gentle washed, hung to dry. Very wrinkled, thought it would launder better.
Material and the flow

The dress is good quality and a lovely look. That being said one must be on thinner side for it to look as good as it does in pictures. Hoping to lose some more weight and then it will fit better, otherwise can look short waisted even though I am 5'6".

This is one of those dresses I really wanted to love. The color was great, the quality seemed good. It just didn’t have that “look” when I opened it that it had online. To me, it was much prettier online than in person.  I tried it on anyway, the ruffles on it were awful. I guess just the height of them or the placement of them on the dress, it just didn’t look good. It looked like something from the thrift store instead of something brand new.  When I ordered a handful of dresses, I thought this was going to be a top pick, unfortunately, it turned out to be a send back.

This dress is comfortable, flattering and great for the price. Not see-thru. Not too heavy! Only issue is it wrinkles pretty quickly and it’s not the easiest to iron with the ruffles. Maybe not best to travel/fly with. There is no side zipper so you have to put it on over your head.  I’d give it 4.5 stars if I could (4 is too low so went with 5).
I bought the dress for an event. I loved it! It’s comfortable, light and so pretty.
Beautiful dress and a great price! Perfect for an outdoor or barn wedding!

It fit me so well. I ordered this dress along with another one for a wedding. I went with the other one because it looked more formal for a wedding in the evening.  But this dress fit so well I had to keep it. The fabric feels great, it is very comfortable, you can dress it up or down, and I know I will be wearing this very soon.  Highly recommend for curvy girls. Outlines waist and hips well, but still very modest.
It looks nice and fits like expected
Loved the look. Great fabric and quality dress

评论概述: Flattering, esp. neckline and ruffling, beautiful design and color, comfortable for warmer seasons
评论详情: Good:  Beautiful dress design and color Flattering fit, esp. neckline and ruffling Midweight and comfortable for warmer seasons or layering  Mixed/JFYI:  A bit too formal for many occasions, but looks great when you need it
Beautifully made. Beautiful color.

Love this dress! It is flowy, a beautiful blue color, comfortable and flattering. Wore it last night to a fancy dinner and it was perfect. I did pair it with a fitted belt vs the belt that came with it.
Fit was all wrong. HUGE arm holes and neckline. Wanted to love, but returned.

The photos attached are my graduation photos that best showcase the dress. The slit is present, though not shown well in these photos. It was a little disappointing to realize that the ruffles do not continue in the back, and it felt a little awkward at first, but after sticking with it I found that it was everything I needed in a dress. The neckline is amazing, and the buttons are sturdy. The ribbon is easily removable allowing the bow to be in the front or the back. It fits as expected. I got to wear this to a wedding, to a holiday, and for my graduation before I have off ally deemed this dress a "daily wear dress". It is great at being formal, but not too fancy to only wear once. This is a win in my book- I am thinking about getting it in a few other colors as well ;)

This dress did not fit well and the fabric felt cheap. This is my fault, but I did not realize that it wasn’t eligible for returns.  The reason stated is ‘due to food safety reasons’.  Ummm…it’s a dress.  Do not buy if you’re on the fence since you cannot send it back.

评论概述: Beautiful but can’t wear a racer back bra
评论详情: I am desperate to find a wedding guest dress that isn’t slutty that I can wear a bra with straps. If you are like me and hoping to wear a racer back bra with this, I’m sad to say the straps do show. The dress is really pretty.
Dress is not flattering for shorter girls and I should have sized down. Also no returns so beware!
Very comfortable and fits perfectly based on Amazon recommendation.  I am so thrilled to find this slimming, classy dress.  Highly recommend!  Plus, machine washable!

I live in the desert so I absolutely love long flowy dresses. This material is lightweight and doesn’t wrinkle too easily. It’s also quite flattering and ties around the waist. I wore this with a black denim jacket and black boots and it was perfect. It fits true-to-size and was very comfortable.

评论概述: Gorgeous, but size up for a bigger bust
评论详情: I wanted to love this dress and I truly loved the fabric, it washed well, and the cut was beautiful ... just not on me. With the halter neck and my bigger bust size, this became an empire waisted dress. Which was fine, but it was still fitted enough in the bust that it pulled at the collar some and just wasn't comfortable to move in. If you have a larger chest, I suggest you size up one for more room to move.

If you want a dress that is truly a white dress, this is for you!  I primarily got this dress to wear to this year’s Diner en Blanc, but I’ll definitely be wearing it on Easter and to a few baby showers this year.  The halter isn’t choke worthy, and the multiple ruffle layers allows for a flattering look. It has some stretch, but not a lot, so order your size or a size larger.
the material quality wise is poor!  wasted my money.

I ordered this dress in peacock blue and I absolutely love the color. The ruffle trim is cute yet elegant and I am really looking forward to wearing it on my upcoming cruise. The fabric feels light and airy, perfect for those warm tropical evenings on deck. Plus, the fit is just right, flattering my figure without being too tight or too loose.

评论概述: Best Cocktail Dress for a Wedding
评论详情: I love this dress when I put it on, fits well, love the silk feel, the neck line and bare shoulders. Great dress for a Spring/Summer wedding or for a special occasion.

评论概述: Classy, comfy and theres 4 colors to choose from.
评论详情: True to size: for me it's always a little stressful gettign clothes online so it alwys makes me happy and relievved when it fits like it should. i'm 5'1 and weigh aroudn 110lbs.  value for money: this is totally worth the money when you buy it. the quality of the seamstress work is superb. the material is soft and feels great against your skin.  overall: this beautiful dress is totally worth 5 stars and highly recommend to others.

My measurements are 43-39-46 and I ordered a large. Dress may look better on others, or maybe I needed a larger size.  Dress has no real shape, and material is rough. Slit doesn’t come up very high, and you get lost in the ruffles.  Was really excited for this dress, and really hoped it would be an elegant dress for spring/summer.

Ordered a medium and fits as such. She is super short, and this still does not drag the floor or get caught in her feet. Fabric is light but not sheer. Drapes as pictured. She is a bit aggravated by the sash. It doesn't stay tied well.

This dress is true to size. The material is smooth and has some weight to it. It is not really thick, but I would not describe it as lightweight. I like that the dress is not clingy, which makes it flattering. The garment is well made. The cost is a fair value for your money. The length and style of the dress are as pictured. I have gotten a few things from this brand, and I have been happy with all of them. I am pleased with this dress!
Lovely dress though floor length on my petite self. The color is true to photo. Size is true to size chart. Material is heavier and not see through.
Very pretty and flattering. Nice length, good material. Overall great pick!
Nice fabric weight, not sheer, drapes well. Flattering style.

评论概述: Beautiful, but underskirt is realllly short
评论详情: The dress is lovely and I love the fabric and drape to it. No pockets, which is a bummer of course, and the underskirt is way too short and doesn't cover my hips, so it ends up bunching up.

Got in pink, size large. Measurements are 41/33/45 and I'm 5ft. Looks just like the photos and fits perfectly. The color is accurate and it's true to the included size chart! It's well made, with solid seams and no loose threads. It drapes well and looks so nice. Very easy to wear and easy to dress up or down. I'm wearing this to a wedding later this year!

This dress is exactly as described, and fits as expected. The color is a beautiful coral orange. The only thing that could make this dress better is pockets. It always amazes me when dress makers don't include them because every person who wears a dress wants them. The length on this dress is perfect on my 5'4" frame and doesn't require that I wear a heel, although it would like fine with high heels. You'll definitely need to wear a strapless bra but could get away with pasties, because the fabric isn't too sheer or revealing. The belt is a nice touch and can be worn at the front, back or side. I love the ruffles!  This is a fantastic dress. You won't regret ordering it.

I'm kinda becoming a fan of Grace Karin brand. They make so beautiful, elegant, feminine clothes. This dress is such a good quality, it has a weight - in a good way of course, it's not just a weightless see through piece of chiffon, it's really a well made dress. Elegant and flattering. I do recommend!

I was pleasantly surprised that the dress fit as well as it did. I ordered a medium and am 5 ft 8, 148 lbs. It fit perfectly and the design is so cute! The materials are nice and it is a little heavy, but the way the dress drapes flatters your figure. The only thing I need is to find the right chest support since it is best to not wear a bra with it. Love the dress!
